appText.title: twitto.be
appText.subtitle: real time dashboard of Belgian tweets
appText.about: Twitto.be is a live dashboard providing analytics about the tweets geolocated in Belgium. The data you're seeing is what is happening right now on twitter, it's real real-time.

appMeta.title: Twitto.be - realtime tweets dashboard
appMeta.description: Twitto.be is a live dashboard providing analytics about the tweets geolocated in Belgium. Curious about what's being tweeted right now? Come have a look
appMeta.description502: Twitto.be is temporarily unavailable - please try again in a few seconds

tweetText.dailyStats: Over the past 24 hours, Belgium sent $1 tweets > https://twitto.be
tweetText.hourlyHashtags: Hashtags trending now in Belgium: $1 > https://twitto.be
tweetText.hourlyMentions: Top mentions right now in Belgium: $1 > https://twitto.be
